text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Yaeno Muteki's I clan has defeated Biwa Hayahide's 
clever schemes with an all or nothing tactic～!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
In an unexpected twist, one of the favorites to win has fallen! 
The Ha clan is no more, with the I clan completely turning 
the tables on their crisis, leaving them the second largest clan!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Great! We've taken down the Ni and To clans without issue. 
We gained good momentum from beating Hayahide's clan.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Like I thought, holding a large territory is definitely 
an advantage…! Let's keep this momentum going.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
… We've arrived. Focus up. From here 
on out we're entering Oguri's territory.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I hope we can find their banner as smoothly 
as we did with Hayahide's clan～

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Mmmmhm, I can't get a read on what the Ro clan is thinking. They do say "a large army hath no need of strategy".

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
That is true. Perhaps they don't have a strategy at all. 
Even at the start, they were at our door in the blink of an eye…

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Those girls will always charge in head first, relying on 
nothing but their pure strength… 'Tis what makes them 
such "monsters"…!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap's Ro clan continues its relentless assault! 
They remain the leading force, as now they're starting 
to break through the frontliiiines～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Damn… I knew it would come to this…!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
I don't see Oguri. They must think there is no reason for 
her to show up yet. If only we knew where their general 
or banner was, we could attempt something…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: —— Waaah～～! This is bad, really bad! They're slowly pushing us back! We can't hold～!! Everyone fall back～～!!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: We shall withdraw for the moment and await an opportunity…!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
General Yaeno Muteki and her I clan is on the defensive! 
They're being completely pushed back. Their army may have 
gained many soldiers, but they're being cut down one by one!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Aah～ They did so well… but with 
such a large difference, well…

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Haah, Haa, Haah… We must endure this. If we do, we should be able to find a way out…!

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
But, General, this won't end well! 
If we keep retreating… time will just run out…

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
… No! Have we not done this once before? 
We won against Hayahide's Ha clan…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Yaeno… But that was……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
I am certain we can do it again… No matter how formidable 
our opponents, if we don't surrender, surely ——

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
(—— Surely our efforts will be rewarded… 
Can I… really say so?)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
(……! Why am I having these thoughts now…? 
This memory of losing…)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
(However… this frustration, it feels familiar… 
Giving my utmost only to be able to stay where I am…)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
(No… no, no, no…! As long as I remain steadfast 
and disciplined, there is a path…!)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: … to victory! I'm sure of it!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Our earnest efforts will never betray us! Wrooooooooooah!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: … Tch! …Everyone, run! Wait… where's No Reason?!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Hmm, hmm… what troubled times we're in, truly. The lot of them have endured well.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
"Hard work will be repaid someday"… 
I would not think it a mistake to believe in that.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
However, 'tis different from "seizing the opportunity". 
…… Wouldst thou not agree, my dear Yaeno?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Fall back! Leave this to me!

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: G-Generaaal～～! Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Good grief, why is a general going out to protect infantry. Really, what are you thinking?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Where have you been while we're struggling here! 
I almost thought you'd been eliminated…!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Sorry, sorry. Though… I guess I no longer have reason to apologize. Khehehe…

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
I shall call it quits on this battle. 
There's no longer any chance of us winning, see.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Hence, from this moment onward… 
I shall fight for Oguri and the Ro clan—!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Wha……! Excuse me!?
